蠻.definition: barbarian; bullying; very; quite; rough; reckless

蠻夷.definition: common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory; barbarian

蠻子.definition: barbarian; slave servant; (old) contemptuous term for people from southern China (used by northern Chinese people)

蠻幹.definition: to act rashly; to act precipitously regardless of the consequences; reckless; foolhardy; daredevil

蠻悍.definition: rude and violent; fierce and reckless

蠻邸.definition: foreign mission (in former times); residence of barbarian emissary
